data.name: Back to KinderGarten 3 : What's this list ? (easy?)
data.description:
Hooray ! At last Odile is proud of her new ["sortByNamesAndAges" function](https://www.codewars.com/kata/57ddbeacae6948cd21000039) to sort the [list of her classroom kids](https://www.codewars.com/kata/57d9808b950d84e1a2000437).

Her friends and colleagues come by hundreds to test it ! Even old man Zozyme, eldest teacher of the town.

But, what happens now ? Let's take a look. . . Code damn it ! 
Is Zozyme a toe-typer ?
How can somenone type so bad csv-list ? ( empty lines, spaces invasion, NOT-commas-separators, . . . )

Odile may either kill Zozyme and burry him deep in the KinderGarten garden **OR** clean his csv.

# Task

Create a `cleanList( csv )` function, with a bad-formatted-`csv`-list as argument and a good-formatted one as return value.

What kind of bad-formatting may occur ?

* empty lines
* line with spaces between values
* value-separators different from "`,`" :  may be "`;`", "`:`" or "`|`"
* line with missing last value if "`m`" (for "male", last field being "gender")
* date-separator different from "`/`" : may be "`.`" or "`-`"
* 2-digits year of Date of Birth: as all kids are XIXth century born a (valid) 4-digits year should start with `20`

### Example

```
 input data         | "issue"           | expected return
--------------------+-------------------+----------------- 
 Alya,1/1/2012,f    |                   |
                    | <-- empty line    | Alya,1/1/2012,f
 Boris,2/2/2013,m   |                   | Boris,2/2/2013,m
                    |                   |
 Alya ,  1/1/2012, f| spaces            | Alya,1/1/2012,f
                    |                   |
 Alya;1/1/2012;f    | wrong sep.(;)     | Alya,1/1/2012,f
                    |                   |
 Boris,2/2/2013     | missing gender (m)| Boris,2/2/2013,m
                    |                   |
 Alya,1-1-2012,f    | wrong date sep.(-)| Alya,1/1/12012,f
                    |                   |
 Boris,2/2/13,m     | shortened year    | Boris,2/2/2013,m
```

Hurry up kids, to work !
